description: Gets configuration information for an adapter specified by an AdapterId, returning information on AdapterName, Description, CreationTime, AutoUpdate status, and FeatureTypes.

parameters.name: AdapterId
parameters.description: A string containing a unique ID for the adapter.

nested_items.name: AdapterId
nested_items.description: A string identifying the adapter that information has been retrieved for.

nested_items.name: AdapterName
nested_items.description: The name of the requested adapter.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The date and time the requested adapter was created at.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description for the requested adapter.

nested_items.name: FeatureTypes
nested_items.description: List of the targeted feature types for the requested adapter.

nested_items.name: AutoUpdate
nested_items.description: Binary value indicating if the adapter is being automatically updated or not.
